HTMLTableCellElementAlign.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The align property of the interface is a string indicating how to horizontally align text in the {{htmlelement("th")}} or {{htmlelement("td")}} table cell.

blockquote.para: This property is deprecated, and CSS should be used to align text horizontally in a cell. Use the CSS text-align property, which takes precedence, to horizontally align text in a cell instead.
